verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w To|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* thee, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H3559"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* trust; let \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* ashamed.

Neither let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* laugh \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* none \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* wait \w on|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* confounded.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* all \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* confounded \w that|strong="H0834"\w* act unjust \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* cause. Shew, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord, thy ways \w to|strong="H7650"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* teach \w me|strong="H5315"\w* thy paths.

\w Direct|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H3468"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy truth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w me|strong="H3468"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* thou art \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* Saviour; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* waited all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day long.

Remember, O Lord, thy bowels \w of|strong="H6440"\w* compassion; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* thy mercies \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* beginning \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* world.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* sins \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* youth \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* ignorances \w do|strong="H0935"\w* not remember. According \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thy mercy remember thou \w me|strong="H0935"\w*: \w for|strong="H4428"\w* thy goodness’ sake, O Lord.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sweet \w and|strong="H3068"\w* righteous: \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w a|strong="H2088"\w* law \w to|strong="H3068"\w* sinners \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* guide \w the|strong="H0935"\w* mild \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H0935"\w*: \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* teach \w the|strong="H0935"\w* meek \w his|strong="H5375"\w* ways.

All \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ways \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* truth, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* seek after \w his|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* testimonies.
For thy name’s sake, O Lord, thou wilt pardon my sin: for it is great.
Who is the man that feareth the Lord? He hath appointed him a law in the way he hath chosen.
His soul shall dwell in good things: and his seed shall inherit the land.
The Lord is a firmament to them that fear him: and his covenant shall be made manifest to them.
My eyes are ever towards the Lord: for he shall pluck my feet out of the snare.
Look thou upon me, and have mercy on me; for I am alone and poor.
The troubles of my heart are multiplied: deliver me from my necessities.
See my abjection and my labour; and forgive me all my sins.
Consider my enemies for they are multiplied, and have hated me with an unjust hatred.
Keep thou my soul, and deliver me: I shall not be ashamed, for I have hoped in thee.
The innocent and the upright have adhered to me: because I have waited on thee.
Deliver Israel, O God, from all his tribulations.
